member.name: T:WebDav.CopyParameters
member.summary: Represents parameters for the COPY WebDAV method.

member.name: M:WebDav.CopyParameters.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:WebDav.CopyParameters.ApplyTo
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the method is to be applied only to the resource or the resource and all its members. It corresponds to the WebDAV Depth header.

member.name: P:WebDav.CopyParameters.DestLockToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the lock token for the destination resource.

member.name: P:WebDav.CopyParameters.Overwrite
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the server should overwrite a non-null destination. For more information see https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa142944.
member.value: true if the the server should overwrite a non-null destination; otherwise false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:WebDav.CopyParameters.Headers
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of http request headers.

member.name: P:WebDav.CopyParameters.CancellationToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the cancellation token.

member.name: T:WebDav.WebDavClientParams
member.summary: Represents parameters for the class.

member.name: M:WebDav.WebDavClientParams.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:WebDav.WebDavClientParams.UseDefaultCredentials
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that controls whether default credentials are sent.
member.value: true if the default credentials are used; otherwise false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:WebDav.WebDavClientParams.BaseAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the base address of the resource's URI used when sending requests.

member.name: P:WebDav.WebDavClientParams.Credentials
member.summary: Gets or sets authentication information used by the WebDavClient.

member.name: P:WebDav.WebDavClientParams.DefaultRequestHeaders
member.summary: Gets or sets the headers which should be sent with each request.

member.name: P:WebDav.WebDavClientParams.PreAuthenticate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an Authorization header should be sent with the request.
member.value: true if an HTTP Authorization header should be send with requests after authentication has taken place; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:WebDav.WebDavClientParams.Proxy
member.summary: Gets or sets proxy information used by the WebDavClient.

member.name: P:WebDav.WebDavClientParams.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a timeout for WebDAV operations.

member.name: P:WebDav.WebDavClientParams.UseProxy
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a proxy should be used for requests.
member.value: true if a proxy should be used for requests; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.summary: Represents an active lock taken on a WebDAV resource.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the lock is to be applied only to the resource or the resource and all its members. It corresponds to the WebDAV Depth header.

member.name: P:WebDav.ActiveLock.LockScope
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this lock is an exclusive lock or a shared lock.

member.summary: Gets the owner of this lock.

member.summary: Gets the root URL of the lock, which is the URL through which the resource was addressed in the LOCK request.

member.name: P:WebDav.ActiveLock.Timeout
member.summary: Gets the duration of this lock.
